attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not necessarily want you to resign, if the overwhelming majority of the Great British public want you to remain in office so be it, but let us have our collective say. Now is the time to receive the public backing you desire or go as the electorate dictates. This is OUR country and one that has stood on a democratic footing for more than a century, respect the land and its people and allow us the General election we deserve.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
